place_description: We were the first specialty coffee shop in Lake Norman and are now expanding to Belmont. Our goal is to create a space where you can have business meetings, study, hang out, or simply grab a quick cup of coffee to-go. We aim to be your home away from home.

reviews_data.review_text: Love this little coffee shop! They make excellent caramel lattes and have a great selection of macaroons
Chill place with a wide variety of treats.

Awesome little coffee spot.
What got us was the ube cold foam 

Easy, fair priced coffee and friendly staff.
Macarons were dank too 

Thank you!
Used to love having a Waterbean near me in Cornelius, NC.... Glad to find out there is now one by my new house!
First good coffee in the US, good service & nice atmosphere :)

Went there for the first time yesterday morning,  heard great things about this place. So we decided to try the Thai tea. Hmmmm. Never again. Nearly taste any tea at all and it was soo bland and had no hint of sweetness. I guess they never tasted real Thai tea before. No repeat customer here
Fast. Delicious. Great atmosphere.

Came in late afternoon. The coffee's good, I got a 20oz mocha for 6.50. The mocha's not sweetened much, if at all, so if you're used to very sugary coffees, make sure to ask for sweetener. The atmosphere feels more high-end than the other coffeeshops I've been to, but still casual. Maybe not a regular stop for me since I live way out of town, but a nice place to visit if you ever swing by this way.
Enjoyed the atmosphere/decor and the coffee was delicious (iced whole milk latte). Will definitely be back.

Phenomenal experience! The atmosphere felt like such a comfortable, cozy place to sit down for a treat to eat or drink. I went here on a date and it was my first time. I ordered the 5 count of macaroons and they were Incredibly soft and decadent! I also ordered this jumbo Rice Krispie treat and it was so fresh, buttery, and soft! I order a peach punch tea but I was unaware that It did not have sugar. I did not like the tea because I'm used to a bit of a sweeter kind of tea. I was thrilled with my overall visit and will definitely be back to your shop.

Nice place, good coffee, but they up charged me for simple syrup in my ice coffee (not flavored).
Who does that?  If I get a hot coffee, is there a charge for sugar packets
So cute!! A little pricey, but definitely worth it because the food and drinks are delicious.
Been here a few times really wanting it to be a good coffee spot, but the service is just awful. I want to support local, but they make it pretty difficult to.

This business is an outstanding addition to this already wonderful community. This spot far exceeded my expectations for a coffee shop in such a small locale. Clean, orderly, well staffed and producing a product which any business owner should be proud to call their own. Owing to the fact that I am originally from Seattle, I can be a bit persnickity regarding my choice in coffee places, and by every measure, Waterbean Coffee, meets or exceeds every single expectation which I have developed.

simple, aesthetic. and the smell of coffee is perfect, of course, you need to love coffee to find the smell of fresh grinded coffee pleasing.

10/10

i will come back for sure, to check the rest of the menu and  support this store.

date: April 10

like i said, i came back and still blowing away by the simplicity of this cafe's theme.

i recommend the latte to start your journey in coffee.

but you can try the affogato,

it's ice cream with espressos shots, different way to enjoy a coffee and ice cream, most i suggest just 1 shot, it may be strong for you.
Good selection to choose from and yummy coffee. A wee bit crowded and cramped with people everywhere on their laptops talking with headphones. Interesting atmosphere, cute decor
Amazing service great coffee

Great place, but service is terrible. If you make a bad drink, fix it or refund the money. That is what real coffee places do. You do not offer another drink for more money. Terrible Customer service.
Best Franchise coffee in Charlotte. Highly suggest the cold brew.

Delicious coffee, ample seating, elegant atmosphere.

This place was great!
I got a medium latte as usual. It was quite tasty.
The decor and setting of the establishment is very cool- a piano in one corner, a unique chair in another, many tables out the back door, and plenty of space to get work done, study or have a conversation.
They also have ice cream which is very cool!

I'll certainly be back for coffee and other treats.
Good service and coffee. Food was good just on pricier side for the sandwiches but it was all very good. Over $10 for a basic smaller coffee and croissant sandwich is only reason for 4 star.

This place is fantastic! Great coffee and deserts  outstanding service and a wonderful, laid back atmosphere!!

I really appreciate that they were so accommodating to me! I asked for my coffee in a ceramic mug , because I don't like to make any more trash than I can help to, and they informed me that their dishwasher was on the fritz and wouldn't be back up until tomorrow.  When I told told them why I didn't want a paper cup, they told me they would be more than happy to accommodate me. What's not to like about this place?

Waterbean Coffee-Belmont is my favorite location! The atmosphere here is always warm and inviting. Drinks that I purchase here, are consistently delicious and I'm greatly appreciative. Furthermore, the staff members are delightful and are an absolute help with drink recommendations. How could I possibly, order my lavender white chocolate mocha anywhere else

I wish I lived in Belmont! My daughted and I visited here on Sunday morning. The service was spectacular. My Chai Tea was the best I've ever had! The cost was reasonable. The atmosphere was wonderful!
Thank you for a memorable experience!

I purchased a Matcha latte, which had a strong fishy taste & smell. Which means this establishment need to do 1 or all, of 3 things to avoid a bad customer experience 1) get better quality matcha 2) review & research better preparation techniques 3)check their storage standards
Very good espresso and latte. Didn't have the food but it looked good.
Love being served in glass when ordering dine in. Also love all the syrup options. Plus super nice staff.

Great place if you like flavored drinks, but not the best for espresso. Their flavored syrups are much better quality and have so much more flavor than most coffee shops, and they have a big flavor selection. The straight espresso was disappointing though. I got the espresso flight and all 3 were very sour. A place that offers an espresso flight should know how to pull a decent espresso. I wouldn't come here for good straight coffee, but will keep coming back for a delicious lavender latte!

Positives: Nice staff, great interior, fast wifi, lots of syrup options for lattes, extensive menu, great location.

Negatives: the espresso is really bad.

I want to love this place, because I enjoy being there and the location is great, but they haven't got the hang of making espresso. They have high quality beans, and very expensive equipment, yet the espresso is way too bitter. If you get a latte or something that has milk, sugar, etc it will mask it fine and taste good. But I like plain espresso. The first one I got was the worst and most bitter espresso I've ever had. I decided maybe it was an off day or just the flavor, so next time I got the espresso flight. I wanted to taste the different flavors, but they all just tasted sour. I gave it a 3rd try a few weeks later with a different barista, but it was still sour and bad.

I want to support local, but the Starbucks espresso is leaps and bounds better as of right now. Even my cheap espresso maker at home bakers a better cup.

I will still come back again at some point, and hope to be able to change my review to 5 stars soon
Great coffee, great space to work!

This place has a really modern vibe with great service. I got the butter-beer latte (holiday special) (toffee, caramel, Irish cream) it was very good. I also got a cranberry white chip cookie. It was also very good.
A little smaller than some of their other locations so it can be a bit loud. A few more electrical outlets would be nice too. But the staff is friendly and the food/ drinks good.
The worst costumer service EVER. I paid for a 6oz coffee and she gave me 1oz. The girl in the cashier is so disrespectful and have an arrogant attitude
Always awesome! The inside is very cozy and great to visit or work.
Comfortable and open atmosphere, easy parking, plenty of seating, friendly staff, delicious food, and amazing drinks!

This place is absolutely amazing. I visit 2x weekly for work related meetings. Customer service is UNmatched, the coffee is always great and so many original options to choose from too. Try the bacon maple or snickerdoodle sweet foam iced options. Your mouth will thank you!!!! And the treats are tasty too. Very much a fan of muffins and macarons. Light music at low tone and ways clean open and airy with natural and low lighting. Come visit, y'all! You will NOT be disappointed.

I come by every afternoon for the best iced coffee you can get anywhere!  It's strong but smoooooth and cold brewed with a lot of care.   Staff is always friendly and welcoming, and I love the atmosphere for getting a few hours of work done as there's always others doing the same all around.   One of the best things to hit Belmont in a long time!
Great tea and coffee. Cozy, quiet atmosphere. Outside tables to enjoy the beautiful fall weather. Go there. You'll be glad you did.
Great location, clean and the staff was helpful. Got the cold brew and everything was made perfectly. I'll be coming back here again!

Rarely write reviews, but this place deserves it. This has been my favorite place in Belmont, which is saying a lot considering how many great places there are around here. I have had many days here for 8+ hours and met multiple people for business here and have only had exceptional experiences. The customer service has been top notch and the coffee is consistently the best I have ever had, and I try something new almost each time. I also want to highlight that Jack has been super friendly, personable, and knowledgeable whenever I am there. Safe to say I am becoming a regular.

I have very mixed feelings. Coffee is good. Staff is so so. There was a gentleman who was very kind but the younger-ish girls making coffee didn't seem to happy or thrilled. I know they were really busy and seemed like they could use some help butttttttt still a smile goes a long way. The space looks nice but isn't very great if you are looking for a place to relax and have a quiet convo or study, it gets loud and easily gets crowded with a handful of people at the front waiting to order. The back patio could be nice and quiet though so that was a nice touch.

The girl on the cashier wasn't polite
The placed is beautiful and clean the other guy jack help me after and he's very polite and respectful he finished doing my order was a nice placed and the banana bread was delicious

Super comfortable chairs! Music not so loud you can't have a conversation. I'm not a big GF person, but tried the pumpkin muffin. It was excellent! I've not had macadamia milk before, and that was great too. Will frequent.

Such a cute addition to Belmont's Main Street. The coffee is quite good and there are a few good items available. The breakfast sandwich was good - definitely will not disappoint but also will not blow your mind.

Place is quiet, lots of different spaces for hanging out. Comfortable for a bit - none of the seating is so comfy after about an hour.  Good place to take your laptop for some work if that's your thing. There's a piano - I've not seen anyone on it since they opened but they do have music regularly. It's got a mid-century modern vibe of white and pastels in velvet. It's cute and makes for a great place to stop off mid day for a coffee break or during your morning routine.
Coffee was not good, tasted like water
Clean, comfortable, pleasant, utilitarian atmosphere. Good food, ice cream, coffees, drinks, snacks. Prices as expected. I'll go back.
Beautiful location with delicious coffee. Avocado toast is so good! So are the breakfast croissants.

Atmosphere is great and cozy! I like European style coffees, so it was really what I need! I tried large latte, it's delicious!
Muffins are fresh and nice! Sandwich is delicious.
Great menu of natural flavors teas, we tried iced peach tea, yum!

Great service and nice people around, thank you!

Iced coffee okay, but most disappointing for my first visit because of short answers and no sense of patience about our excitement to finally be trying this new coffee bar restaurant in Belmont. I didn't feel welcome or valued.
The coffee and ice cream was delicious. The entire location was really clean. The employees were very helpful and kind. We will definitely be returning to this coffee shop!

This place is brand new, and very nice! In Belmont.
Great selection of coffee from around the world. I had an espresso that the beans were from Vietnam. Great!
Had an iced vanilla latte, and it was absolutely delicious! Definitely going back!

What a quaint and modern place. I feel that most coffee shops I go to try to lean towards a more comfortable and vintage atmosphere, but this shop is modern, large, and quiet. It's not what I had expected when I walked in but I was pleasantly surprised. The workers were kind and brought our drinks to us (I wasn't expecting that at all, very hands-on) and the interaction with them was quick but not rushed.

The coffees we got are the paradise latte (one with purple) and the everything latte. The paradise latte has an ube cold foam, and if you've never had ube, it seems to have a mild yet creamy flavor that compliments the coffee well. The everything latte has a cream cheese cold foam, something I've never seen before, but it's a unique flavor and tastes nice. They also have small bakery items and ice cream. There is plenty of seating and it's nice to just relax and enjoy your coffee.

I recommend this coffee shop if you want to try something new or just sit down and do some work. They have outlets everywhere and wifi.
I had a Chai latte, it was excellent! They had some beautiful looking cookies, cakes and snacks but I didn't have any.

We came on a Saturday morning to try a new place. If you're looking for a completely different feel from the South or any other typical coffee shop, this may be your place. The cashier at the front was kind but the ladies calling out names and giving you your coffee and food at the end of the bar area could have been more friendly. If you're used to walking in, feeling comfortable, and having the kindest people serve and talk to you, this may not be your place. While beautiful, it has a very New York with retro chairs feeling to it which comes with a lack of southern hospitality. The Bagel was great and coffees were good, but I was never asked what kind of milk was okay (I don't know if you are able to do that here, I was much too busy trying to scan over a menu while she was trying to take my order as we had never been there) and we didn't get an extra shot of espresso in either of our drinks that we ordered and we kind of just felt out of place. There is a nice area out back where you can enjoy your coffee outside by the flower beds.

Stoped by with my wife to try out the coffee and what a great surprise. The inside has a high  end vibe coffee shop in Manhattan. The decoration and staff is superb. The coffee had an amazing taste. They have expresso flights and siphon flights. Will have to try next time. My wife tried the paradise foam iced coffee which was super good and I had the snickerdoodle foam with 1 pump not 2 and it was awesome. They do everything a la carte. Finally a good coffee shop in Belmont that meets my high standards

This place was very fancy, I felt a little too dressed down. But, really everyone was very down to earth and super friendly. It seemed like there were a lot of regulars in that morning.
I had one of the staff favorites, Cinnamon and Brown sugar Latte with Oat Milk.
It was very good.
Beautiful, cheery, bright & happy coffee shop! I got the Snickerdoodle cold foam iced latte.

We enjoyed our Cappuccino and Vietnamese coffee. The Atmosphere is beautiful. We had the pleasure of having a customer play the piano!
The small is a little too small but will try it again

So happy this coffee shop has opened.  It's absolutely beautiful inside and the staff is so friendly and polite and welcoming. There are plenty of tables to enjoy your coffee at, and you can hop on the Wi-Fi and bring your laptop and work.  On top of that, the coffee is delicious!
